testsuite.name: au.org.ala.ecodata.RecordControllerSpec

testcase.name: get should return a 401 (SC_UNAUTHORIZED) if a user is requesting an embargoed record for a project they are not a member of
get should return a 401 (SC_UNAUTHORIZED) if there is no userId when requesting an embargoed record
get should return the record if a user is requesting an embargoed record for a project they ARE a member of
get should return the record if a user is requesting an embargoed record for a project they submitted, even if they are not a project admin or editor
get should return the record if the user is an ALA Admin
count should not include DELETED records
list should not include DELETED records
list should not include embargoed records unless the embargo date has passed when there is no userid
list should include embargoed records when there is a userid and the record belongs to a project where the user is a member
list should include embargoed records when there is a userid and the user is an ALA Admin
listUncertainIdentifications should not include DELETED records
listUncertainIdentifications should not include embargoed records unless the embargo date has passed when there is no userid
listUncertainIdentifications should include embargoed records when there is a userid and the record belongs to a project where the user is a member
listUncertainIdentifications should include embargoed records when there is a userid and the user is an ALA Admin
listRecordWithImages should not include DELETED records
listRecordWithImages should not include embargoed records unless the embargo date has passed when there is no userid
listRecordWithImages should include embargoed records when there is a userid and the record belongs to a project where the user is a member
listRecordWithImages should include embargoed records when there is a userid and the user is an ALA Admin
listForUser should not include DELETED records
listForProject should not include DELETED records
listForProject should not include embargoed records unless the embargo date has passed when there is no userid
listForProject should include embargoed records when there is a userid and the user is a member of the parent project
listForProject should include embargoed records when there is a userid and the user submitted the record
listForProject should include embargoed records when there is a userid and the user is an ALA Admin
